description:
Tombo is a boy from the city of http://anidb.net/ch40121 [Koriko] who is obsessed with aviation, and is a member of a club building a human-powered aircraft. He is at first intrigued only by http://anidb.net/ch11210 [Kiki]`s ability to fly, but later becomes her friend.
Tombo (tonbo 蜻蛉 [とんぼ] = dragonfly) is only his nickname; his real name is Kopori (as Kiki learns when he acts as her customer).
name: Tombo
